name: Scary Ragdoll in Horror House
description: Welcome to the scary baby in the horror house! Do you have the courage to explore the dark haunted house and meet the evil child face to face in creepy horror games? In these babysitter’s games simulators, you are operating in a dark & yellow house as an evil granny nanny. These offline creepy games consist of virtual nightmares in dark pink houses that will be a hell of magic tricks and different situations to control in such an unruly granny in the yellow baby house of scare game.
